com.bumptech.glide.resize.load
Interface BitmapDecoder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of resource this decoder can decode a Bitmap from.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Downsampler, VideoBitmapDecoder
public interface BitmapDecoder<T>

A bitmap decoder for a given resource type.

Method Summary
 android.graphics.Bitmap decode(T resource, BitmapPool bitmapPool, int outWidth, int outHeight)
          Returns a decoded bitmap for a given resource and target dimensions.
 java.lang.String getId()
          Returns some unique String id that distinguishes this decoder from any other decoder.
 

Method Detail

decode

android.graphics.Bitmap decode(T resource,
                               BitmapPool bitmapPool,
                               int outWidth,
                               int outHeight)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a decoded bitmap for a given resource and target dimensions.

Parameters:
resource - The resource to decode.
bitmapPool - A bitmap pool that can be used to reuse bitmaps during the load. Any bitmaps created or obtained from the pool other than the bitmap returned by this method should be returned to the pool.
outWidth - The target width for the returned bitmap (need not match exactly).
outHeight - The target height for the returne bitmap (need not match exactly).
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getId

java.lang.String getId()
Returns some unique String id that distinguishes this decoder from any other decoder.
